trends: There has been one other sighting in North Syracuse
There were no other sightings in North Syracuse on or around June 25th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my front porch in a conversation when I witnessed in the northen sky a large bright, round, flash of light that glowed in orange, red and yellow, which dissapated and flew off in a streak of the same colors towards the western sky in a 45 degree angle at a high rate of speed. Upon first spotting the object I was concerned that there had been an explosion, then when it streaked through the sky and was not accompinied by any sounds I realized my initial thought had been wrong and that I may have just spotted a U.F.O. and was left with a feeling of awe. I wished I could have seen more of it but that was impossible because of the speed in which it traveled.
